meanings.definition: The surgical transplantation of tissue from one part of the body to another.
meanings.sent1: Autografting involves moving tissue within the same body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors performed autografting to repair the damaged area.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the tissue decided to go on a little adventure through autografting.
meanings.sent4: The process of autografting is like nature's own repair kit for the body.
meanings.sent5: The concept of autografting is like a magical relocation spell for tissues.

meanings.definition: The process of grafting tissue from one individual to another.
meanings.sent1: Autografting involves transferring tissue between different people.
meanings.sent2: The success of autografting depends on tissue compatibility.
meanings.sent3: The tissue felt like a superstar as it underwent autografting to a new host.
meanings.sent4: Autografting can be seen as a gift of life from one person to another.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of autografting lies in its ability to connect individuals through tissue exchange.
